actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide for the mailing of letter mail to Senators and Representatives in Congress at no cost to the sender

summary.text: Permits the mailing of letter mail to Senators and Representatives in Congress at no cost to the sender, when addressed to his D.C. office or district office. Provides for the payment to the Postal Service of Treasury revenue to cover the provisions of this Act. (Adds 39 U.S.C. 3219)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide for the mailing of letter mail to Senators and Representatives in Congress at no cost to the sender
